title: Czech Republic Retail Sales YoY
description: Retail Sales in Czech Republic decreased 5.60 percent in September of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Retail Sales YoY in Czech Republic averaged 3.49 percent from 2001 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 14.70 percent in October of 2001 and a record low of -9.60 percent in April of 2020. In Czech Republic, the year-over-year change in Retail sales compares the aggregated sales of retail goods and services during a certain month to the same month a year ago. This page provides - Czech Republic Retail Sales YoY - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Czech Statistical Office
